item.title: Essential Location Based Apps for Android Mobiles
item.description: Everyone is used to taking their mobile with them, so that means location basedapps for mobiles will start to become more popular. A recent issue of Wired noted that it was thanks to Foursquare& Gowalla, that people are now getting more used to sharing their location. On a fun side, many of the new location based mobile apps have games or allow you to collect rewards for visiting new places. Here’s an essential list of location based apps for Androidmobile.
